featured.text: Using metal hinges, Jeanie attached one piece of the wood to the front of the cabinet door, and the second piece to the first.
When not in use, the hinges allowed the two pieces of wood to fold back up tightly against the cabinet, where they were held in place by magnets.

definition.zh_def: 合頁；一種連接兩個物體的機械裝置，允許它們相對於彼此轉動。
definition.en_def: A mechanical device that connects two objects, allowing them to pivot relative to each other.
definition.example: The door creaked as the hinge rusted over time.
